706777f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 79th Street
706777f-a.text:
(1)
Shore Road, at the N.E. corner of 79th Street, showing the J. Remsen
Bennett house, which was erected about 1862. This house was owned by
David C. Bennett in 1912: in 1917, it was sold to a group of realtors.
The house no longer appears on the 1929 maps of Brooklyn.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Cellection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
TThe same, from the south side.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

706776f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 79th Street
706776f-a.text:
Shore Road, east side, at 79th Street. From right to left, a view
of the homes of W. R. and A. Bennett, facing Shore Road. In the fore-
ground is a coffer dam in connection with the building of a new sewer outlet.
About 1917.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAt BE REPRODUCED.
